Hello,

this is the Blog.
Below you find a list with the posts. This blog is build using jekyll. So don't wonder if it sometimes makes strange things. I'm always fiddeling around with it. I will use disqus asap to give you the oportunity to leave comments. I tried Tumblr, I also tried wordpress and I'm using a lot of twitter lately. But sometimes I have to say more than I could fit in a tweet and tumblr somehow isn't the right thing for me. Thats why I use jekyll now for blogging like a hacker. There is a RSS Feed for this blog. Cheers
